post.desc:
While manipulating the boundaries, Merry inadvertently walked the fourth of the six walking ways to reach heaven through violence.

Yukari is and has always been the sukima yōkai. But at this specific point beyond the rule of the dragon, boundaries had been blurred between the two actresses. Merry walked like Yukari until Yukari walked like her.

Maëlivérie Hearn is and has always been Yakumo Yukari, and Yakumo Yukari is and has always been Maëlivérie Hearn. This is and has always been.

The ending of the words is ALIPATMA.
